description: Show stats from nginx VTS module (direct, without exporter)

panels.description: Requests per second grouped by response code
panels.title: Requests

panels.description: Requests per second grouped by response code

targets.expr: sum(rate(label_replace(nginx_vts_filter_requests_total{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", code!="total", filter=~"region::.*", filter_name=~"$host", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval], "region", "$1", "filter", "region::(.*)"))) by (region)

panels.title: Requests by region

targets.expr: sum(rate(label_replace(nginx_vts_filter_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", code!="total", filter=~"region::.*", filter_name=~"$host", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval], "region", "$1", "filter", "region::(.*)"))) by (region)

panels.description: Requests per second grouped by response code
panels.title: Requests by host

panels.description: Requests per second grouped by response code
panels.title: Throughput by host

panels.description: Requests per second grouped by response code
panels.title: Requests by URL

panels.description: Requests per second grouped by response code
panels.title: Throughput by URL

panels.description: This one is providing aggregated error codes, but it's still possible to graph these per upstream.
panels.title: Upstream requests

targets.expr: sum(increase(label_replace(nginx_vts_filter_cache_total{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", code!="total", filter=~"region::.*", filter_name=~"$host", pod=~"$pod", status="hit"}[$__rate_interval], "region", "$1", "filter", "region::(.*)"))) by (region)

sum(increase(label_replace(nginx_vts_filter_cache_total{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", code!="total", filter=~"region::.*", filter_name=~"$host", pod=~"$pod", status="hit"}[$__rate_interval], "region", "$1", "filter", "region::(.*)"))) by (filter_name)

sum(increase(label_replace(nginx_vts_filter_cache_total{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", code!="total", filter=~"region::.*", filter_name=~"$host", pod=~"$pod", status="miss"}[$__rate_interval], "region", "$1", "filter", "region::(.*)"))) by (region)

sum(increase(label_replace(nginx_vts_filter_cache_total{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", code!="total", filter=~"region::.*", filter_name=~"$host", pod=~"$pod", status="miss"}[$__rate_interval], "region", "$1", "filter", "region::(.*)"))) by (filter_name)

sum(increase(label_replace(nginx_vts_filter_cache_total{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", code!="total", filter=~"region::.*", filter_name=~"$host", pod=~"$pod", status="stale"}[$__rate_interval], "region", "$1", "filter", "region::(.*)"))) by (region)

sum(increase(label_replace(nginx_vts_filter_cache_total{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", code!="total", filter=~"region::.*", filter_name=~"$host", pod=~"$pod", status="stale"}[$__rate_interval], "region", "$1", "filter", "region::(.*)"))) by (filter_name)

title: Nginx VTS Stats
